title.value: Basic stages of the new selection scheme of phytopathogens-free parent material of potato for introduction to culture in vitro
Основные этапы новой схемы отбора родоначального материала картофеля, свободного от фитопатогенов, для введения в культуру in vitro

person.name: Radkovich, E.V., National Academy of Sciences of Belarus, Minsk (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing
Adamova, A.I., National Academy of Sciences of Belarus, Minsk (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studies on application of the new scheme of selection of initial material from clones of the potato (Solanum tuberosum) intended for the further reception by biotechnological methods of parent plants of a potato. It is shown that owing to high-sensitivity molecular methods of diagnostic ELISA and PCR analysis on a complex of pathogens with application of indexation there was a possibility to identify a healthy starting material before introduction in culture in vitro. Investigations were carried out in accordance with the scheme of selection of healthy potato clones. According to the scheme, carried out by ELISA there was realized testing of indices obtained from 462 potato clones for the presence of latent infection to Potato Virus X, Potato Virus Y, Potato Virus S and Potato Virus M. According to the analysis there were revealed 328 clones of varieties: Manifest, Uldar, Dina and Lasunak free from viral infection. It is presented in the tested samples in pure or in mixed form. Potato Virus X was marked in 9%, Potato Virus Y – in 5%, Potato Virus S – in 14.5%, and Potato Virus M – in 16% of tested clones.
